name: Type: Unconfirmed Bug
description: Report that hasn't been verified / reproduced by a maintainer or trusted community member yet

name: Type: Bug
description: Report that has been identified / verified as an issue requiring resolution

name: Type: Conceptual Enhancement
description: Proposed enhancement that has not been implemented yet but is still in the discussion stage

name: Type: Enhancement
description: Proposed enhancement that has been accepted / implemented

name: Type: Maintenance
description: Minor maintenance to the code base (i.e. minor bug fixes, styling fixes, translation improvements)

name: Type: Discussion
description: Issue that is meant for discussion between members of the community

name: Type: Question
description: Issue that is actually just a question

name: Status: Archived
description: Has not seen any activity in at least 60 days, used to prompt stakeholders to action

name: Status: Accepted
description: Enhancement that has been approved in theory.

name: Status: Blocked
description: Blocked from progressing by something (usually another related issue / PR)

name: Status: Completed
description: Fix is completed and merged into the main development branch

name: Status: In Progress
description: Currently being worked on

name: Status: On Hold
description: Put on hold for now but will be worked on again in the future

name: Status: Response Needed
description: Requires / is waiting on a response from at least one of the participants

name: Status: Review Needed
description: Requires review from a maintainer or trusted community member

name: Status: Revision Needed
description: Requires changes before it can be accepted

name: Status: Testing Needed
description: Requires testing before it can be accepted

name: Priority: Critical
description: Critical issue that needs to get addressed immediately - breaking build, composer issue, security

name: Priority: High
description: Issue that should be resolved for inclusion in the next build

name: Priority: Medium
description: Issue that is on the horizon to be addressed at some point

name: Priority: Low
description: Issue / PR that in theory would be accepted, but maintainers aren't planning on working on it

name: duplicate
description: Duplicate of another issue / PR and is being closed in favour of the other

name: good first issue
description: Good candidate for newcomers to the project to begin contributing on

name: hacktoberfest
description: Good fit for Hacktoberfest contributions

name: help wanted
description: Makes the issue / PR show up in GitHub's list of Help Wanted issues / PRs

name: third party
description: Not related to the repository, it must be handled by a third party instead

name: Website / Marketplace / Docs
description: Issue is related to the Winter CMS.com marketplace or documentation
